feed.title: TCMG412 Project 1 - Political Extremism and the Internet

entry.title: Political Extremism and the Internet

author.name: Ayo Okunnu, Alec Azar, Ebenezer Zabayor, Nicholas Lerma

entry.content: Political Extremism is a big issue in our world today and the internet plays a huge role in facilitating this. On the following pages, we will be discussing issues that deal with political extremism and how the internet facilitated in helping people become more radical online based on their views.
